dc_description_s: This is a MD iMAP hosted service layer. Find more information at http://imap.maryland.gov. Metro Stations (regional). The dataset contains points representing locations and attributes of Metro stations, created as part of the DC Geographic Information System (DC GIS) for the D. C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) and participating D. C. government agencies. Platform centroids were identified from visual observation of orthophotography and extracted planimetric data. Centroids were heads-up digitized from the snapbase. This data was downloaded by DoIT staff from http://dcatlas. dcgis. dc. gov/catalog/download. asp downloadID=2171downloadTYPE=ESRILast Updated: 10/12/2012
